customer_name: Parker Exotic Pets L L C

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Several of the green cheeked parakeet cages have excessive waste caked to the inside and outside of the cages. On
several of the enclosures, the cage bars and railing are covered with a large concretion of excrement, food, and dust. One
cage has a large area of brown waxy buildup on the inside of the cage next to the water receptacle.
The licensee must ensure that excreta and food waste are removed from primary enclosures and from under and around
primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste, to prevent soiling
of the birds contained in the primary enclosures, and to reduce disease hazards, insects, pests, and odors.
Corrected by cleaning the entirety of the cages until all caked-on waste is removed. Corrected by September 27th, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.158(a)(1) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Several of the green cheeked parakeet cages have excessive waste caked to the inside and outside of the cages. On 
several of the enclosures, the cage bars and railing are covered with a large concretion of excrement, food, and dust. One 
cage has a large area of brown waxy buildup on the inside of the cage next to the water receptacle. 
 
The licensee must ensure that excreta and food waste are removed from primary enclosures and from under and around 
primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste, to prevent soiling 
of the birds contained in the primary enclosures, and to reduce disease hazards, insects, pests, and odors. 
 
Corrected by cleaning the entirety of the cages until all caked-on waste is removed. Corrected by September 27th, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
